passives.name: Sapping Barbs
passives.effects: Grants 40 health regeneration and 30 mana regeneration whenever you take damage from a monster. Additionally, monsters who attack you bleed for 5% of their maximum health over 3 seconds (capped at 150 damage). Sapping Barbs cannot deal lethal damage.

active.name: Hunter's Ward
active.effects: Places a Stealth Ward that reveals the surrounding area for 180 seconds (600 range) (180 second cooldown).
